title: How to Adjust Playback Settings on YouTube

steps.title: Sign in to YouTube.
steps.content: Sign in to YouTube. The first thing you will need to do is go to the website, www.youtube.com, and sign in using your email address and password.

steps.title: Click on Settings.
steps.content: Click on Settings. When you are logged in and on the home screen, you will need to click on the avatar on the top right of your screen. From there, go down and click on Settings.

steps.title: Select “Playback.
steps.content: Select “Playback. ” On the left hand side of the new page, you will see the “Account” menu. Select ‘Playback’ option from the list below, which is the third option.

steps.title: Adjust the Playback settings.
steps.content: Adjust the Playback settings. From here, you can adjust a number of things. You can modify things such as the AV1 Settings, Live Cards, and Captions.
